specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Plain > Chiffon This fabric can easily build up static electricity, especially in dry conditions. To prevent this, make sure the air has enough moisture.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Recommended Use Blouses, Dresses
